channel.title: Virtual Swag Bag on Beam Summit 2021
channel.description: Recent content in Virtual Swag Bag on Beam Summit 2021

item.title: 35% off all products from Manning Publications
item.description: Use code ctwbeamsummit20 to get 35% off any title from Manning Publications when ordering through their website.

item.title: Get the ebook \"Apache Pulsar in Action\"
item.description: Join a raffle for free download codes for the upcoming “Apache Pulsar in Action” book.

item.title: 25% off data science titles from Packt
item.description: Get a 25% discount on selected titles related to Beam and Data Science.

item.title: 15% off training at Flink Forward
item.description: Get 15% off tickets for training days at Flink Forward Global Virtual Conference.

item.title: 50% off Google Cloud specializations on Coursera
item.description: Get 50% off the first month on Google Cloud Specializations on Coursera.

item.title: Win Bose Noise Cancelling Headphones 700
item.description: Participants who join live sessions of Beam Summit automatically enter a raffle for a set of Bose Noise Cancelling Headphones 700.
